strings.SS2_NEMBANDIT_DESCRIPTION:
The Nemesis Bandit carefully positions himself via camouflage technology to wrangle foes and cull crowds. 

<color=#CCD3E0>< ! > Show no mercy.
strings.SS2_NEMBANDIT_OUTRO_FLAVOR: ..and so he left, with absolutely no regrets.
strings.SS2_NEMBANDIT_OUTRO_FAILURE: ..and so he returned, luck finally running out.
strings.SS2_NEMBANDIT_PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Fire a revolver shot for <style=cIsDamage>220% damage</style>. Can hold up to 6 bullets.
strings.SS2_NEMBANDIT_SPECIAL_DESCRIPTION: Fire a shotgun burst for <style=cIsDamage>6x100% damage</style>. Kills <style=cIsUtility>reset all your cooldowns.</style>
